Detailed Description

A scatter plot data source.

) [virtual]

Gets a plot symbol for the given scatter plot.

Parameters:
plotThe scatter plot.
indexThe data index of interest.
Returns:
The plot symbol to show for the point with the given index.

[recordIndexRange] NSRange  indexRange

Gets a range of plot symbols for the given scatter plot.

Parameters:
plotThe scatter plot.
indexRangeThe range of the data indexes of interest.
Returns:
An array of plot symbols.
